Pawnmorph.ListedBackstoryDef.title: former human
Pawnmorph.ListedBackstoryDef.baseDesc: A colony turned [PAWN_nameDef] into an animal, using mutagenic mechanites. (Un?)fortunately, [PAWN_pronoun] retains [PAWN_possessive] human mind...but for how long? In this state, [PAWN_nameDef] can be drafted, have limited social interactions and will need to be kept happy to resist instinct creeping in.
